channel.title: How can i add this?
channel.description:
hi,
i've added pvp statues to my pk server ancient stat etc. but now i want to add mandrith and when u click talk him he trades the items for cash how can i do that help please
(i got npc id)

item.title: How can i add this?

Okay, well then you should put that in your information that you have that, otherwise people wouldn’t know -.-.

item.title: How can i add this?
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

I’m not 100% sure but I think it’s to do with client.java make a method for Mandrith to trade 995 for the id of the item, if not just make him like a general store, go into item.java and change the prices for the items and then make the shop (1), which allows the ability for you to buy and sell anything.

Read full topic
